sentence.Network_en: Boil the congee that come out agglutinate, stick already sweet sweet still.

list.abs: 颗粒,然后与相应抗体(或抗原)作用,在适宜的电解质存在的条件下,出现特异性凝集现象,称间接凝集反应(indirect agglutination)或被动凝集反应(passive agglutination)。.
...chromatin 染色质[真核DNA与组蛋白形成的复合物]chromatin agglutination 染色质凝聚chromatin bridge 染色质桥
agglutination 集聚agglutinative index 粘着指数aggregate adjustment 综合调整
2.凝集试验（agglutination test) 将可疑肺炎球菌与已知型血清作，若细菌凝集成堆，为同型肺炎球菌。12细菌的防治肺炎链球菌感染关键在于.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin agglutinat- 'caused to adhere', from the verb agglutinare, from ad- 'to' + glutinare (from gluten 'glue')

means.word_mean: 1. string together (morphemes in an agglutinating language)
2. clump together; as of bacteria, red blood cells, etc.
